Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: Northbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and over regular route due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates and over regular route due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Southbound buses are not affected.
